verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: (Пророк) нахмурился и отвернулся

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14298'>ن ج</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14299'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: Оттого, что подошел к нему слепой (и речь прервал)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا يُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':10898'>دْ</tajweed>رِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: Как знать тебе, Быть может, душу он свою очистить хочет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14300'>نف</tajweed>َعَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14301'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ذِّكْرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: И он воспримет увещания твои И пользу извлечет из них

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا مَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14302'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Тому же, кто богат (и знатен)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14303'>نت</tajweed>َ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: Ты обращаешь все свое вниманье

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Хотя твоей вины не будет, Коль не очистится (его душа)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14304'>ن ج</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: А тем же, кто со тщанием к тебе приходит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Испытывая (в сердце) страх

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14303'>نت</tajweed>َ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: Пренебрегаешь ты

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Но нет! Ведь это, несомненно, назидание Господне

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8041'>ن ش</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: И всяк, кто этого желает, Пусть в памяти его хранит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى صُحُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14305'>فٍ م</tajweed>ُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: Оно - в Писаниях почетных

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَّرْفُوعَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14306'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ُّطَهَّرَةِۭ
verses.translation: Исполненных величия и чистоты

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Начертанных руками слуг Господних

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كِرَا<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':14307'>مِۭ ب</tajweed>َرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Почтенных и благочестивых

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُتِلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14308'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2732'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَكْفَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Пусть сгинет человек! Что же заставило его отречься

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
verses.translation: И из чего Господь создал его

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7325'>ِن ن</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7326'>طْ</tajweed>فَةٍ خَلَقَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Из капли спермы Он его создал, И вид придал, и соразмерил

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14309'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
verses.translation: И облегчил его пути земные

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ أَمَاتَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> فَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14310'>قْ</tajweed>بَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Затем Он в смерть его поверг и уложил в могилу

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ إِذَا ش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14311'>نش</tajweed>َرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Потом, будь Его воля, Он воскресит его опять

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَلَّا لَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14312'>قْ</tajweed>ضِ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Так нет же! Человек не делает того, Что заповедано ему (Аллахом)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلْيَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14313'>نظ</tajweed>ُرِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14314'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2732'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
verses.translation: Пусть взглянет он на свою пищу

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا صَبَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14315'>بْ</tajweed>نَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14316'>ٱ</tajweed>لْم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: (Чтоб мог ее он получить), Обильно воды Мы излили

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ شَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14317'>قْ</tajweed>نَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14318'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: И расщепили землю

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':9998'>نۢب</tajweed>َتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: Для прорастанья злаков

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَعِنَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14319'>بًا و</tajweed>َقَضْبًا
verses.translation: И виноградных лоз, и трав съедобных

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَزَيْتُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14320'>نًا و</tajweed>َنَخْلاً
verses.translation: Оливковых и финиковых пальм

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَحَد<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: И возвели сады густые

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَفَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14321'>ةً و</tajweed>َأَبًّا
verses.translation: И фрукты, и луга

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَّتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3808'>عًا ل</tajweed>َّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِكُمْ
verses.translation: Для пользы вам и вашему скоту

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإِذَا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14322'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صّ<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓخَّةُ
verses.translation: И вот, когда раздастся вопиющий вскрик

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14323'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.translation: В тот День Покинет человек родного брата

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَأَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.translation: Отца и мать

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَصَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>حِبَتِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَبَن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.translation: Супругу и детей

verses.text_uthmani: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِكُلِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9345'>ٱ</tajweed>مْرِى<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9346'>ٍٕ م</tajweed>ِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14324'>ذٍ ش</tajweed>َأْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14325'>نٌ ي</tajweed>ُغْن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.translation: У каждого из них В тот День Своих тревог будет сполна

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وُجُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14135'>هٌ ي</tajweed>َوْمَئِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14326'>ذٍ م</tajweed>ُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: В тот День Сияющими будут лица у одних

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ضَاحِكَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14327'>ةٌ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14328'>بْ</tajweed>شِرَةٌ
verses.translation: На них - и смех, и радость

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَوُجُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14137'>هٌ ي</tajweed>َوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: Другие ж лица В этот День Покроет пыль

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: И прах падет на них

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14329'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَفَرَةُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14330'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: Такими будут (лица) распутников и нечестивых
